content.heading: About Verdant
paragraphs: We believe that everyone deserves to enjoy the beauty and benefits of plants, regardless of experience level.
Our mission is to make plant care accessible, enjoyable, and rewarding.
Founded by a team of horticulture experts and plant enthusiasts, Verdant provides scientifically-based care advice while keeping things simple enough for beginners.

content.heading: Expert Tips & Tricks
content.subheading: Simple solutions to common plant problems

tips.title: Rotate Your Plants Regularly
tips.description: Plants grow toward light sources, so rotate them a quarter turn weekly to keep them growing evenly and balanced.

tips.title: Use Room Temperature Water
tips.description: Cold water can shock plant roots. Always use room temperature water for a happier, healthier plant.

tips.title: Clean Those Leaves
tips.description: Dusty leaves can block sunlight and prevent proper photosynthesis. Wipe them gently with a damp cloth monthly.

tips.title: Group Plants Together
tips.description: Plants grouped together create a microclimate with higher humidity, which benefits most houseplants.
